name: Classic Teddy Bear
details: SOFT & HUGGABLE: This adorable plush toy is made from soft, huggable materials and features surface-washable construction for easy cleaning. Every Toothpick teddy bear plush is appropriate for ages 1 and up and ships in a protective poly bag.

name: GUND Philbin Teddy Bear
details: CLASSIC BIG BROWN TEDDY BEAR: Philbin’s big paws mean bigger bear hugs to share with friends! This classic chocolate brown 18 plush stuffed bear design features cute paw pad accents and a curious expression that’s impossible not to love!

name: GUND Kai Teddy Bear
details: KAI TEDDY BEAR: Available in 12 and 23 sizes, Kai boasts super-soft plush, a whimsical, modern style with an oversized head, embroidered paw pads, and a beige muzzle. Kai is perfect for every personality, available in multiple sizes and colors.

name: Concavenator Dinosaur
details: Discover the thrills and adventure of the whole Jurassic World Series captured in this line that is named for Jurassic Park's founder and sets a new quality standard for dinosaur collectables – The Hammond Collection!
Celebrate Jurassic Park’s 30th Anniversary! It’s been 30 years since the premiere of the franchise in 1993. Special themed packaging includes the 30th Anniversary logo.

name: Corythosaurus Dinosaur
details: Deluxe articulation! This action figure has 16 movable joints and a wired tail to accommodate multiple posing options for play, display and scene creation.

name: Jellyroll Unicorn
details: High quality materials and hand construction makes for a unique and soft touch. Vibrant hot pink fur patterned with pastel yellow and lavender swirls and a fluffy light pink mane and tail

name: Bubblegum Koala
details: Vibrant aqua-blue fur patterned with pastel pink and yellow swirls and bright aqua ears Shiny and holographic plush silver unicorn horn Lock-washer eyes and double-bagged filling

name: Tutti Frutti Pegasus
details: Bright purple holographic plush wings and an equally bright purple mane and tail Lock-washer eyes and double-bagged filling ensure safety and long-term enjoyment suitable for all ages
